long_description: Smith Chief polarized sunglasses sport optical precision and visual clarity that surpass all expectations. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Techlite polarized glass TLT lenses provide 100% UVA/B/C protection with exceptionally thin, sturdy construction for weight savings. Tapered Lens Technology(TM) contours the thickness of the lens so that light travels through without distortion. Frames are made from bio-plastic Rilsan(R) Clear (derived from non-GMO castor seeds) for a resilient, consistent fit. Black frames feature polarized gray green lenses to reduce reflected glare while sharpening detail. Special lens coating repels water, dirt, fingerprints and grease from surface of glass. 8 base-curve lens: the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature. Lightweight frames have a medium fit with medium to large coverage. Smith Chief polarized sunglasses come with a coconut fiber storage bag.
